title: TaskEnvelope
description: Envelope describing a task dispatched on the agents bus.

id.description: A unique identifier for the task.

type.description: The type of task being executed.

created_at.description: Timestamp when the task was created.

priority.description: Relative priority of the task. 0 is highest.

actor.description: Name of the component creating the task.

payload.description: Arbitrary JSON payload for the task.
